welcomeMessage: Olecons Technology Private Limited is a Private incorporated on 29 May 2018. It is classified as Non-govt company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Gwalior. Its authorized share capital is Rs. 100,000 and its paid up capital is Rs. 100,000. It is inolved in Business activities n.e.c. Olecons is dedicated to providing high-quality technology solutions to our clients. With a team of experienced professionals, we strive to deliver innovative and reliable services that meet the evolving needs of businesses in today's digital landscape. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction drives our success in the industry.Olecons is dedicated to providing high-quality technology solutions to our clients. With a team of experienced professionals, we strive to deliver innovative and reliable services that meet the evolving needs of businesses in today's digital landscape. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction drives our success in the industry.Olecons Technology Private Limited's Annual General Meeting (AGM) was last held on N/A and as per records from Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA), its balance sheet was last filed on 31 March 2022.With a team of experienced professionals, we strive to deliver innovative and reliable services that meet the evolving needs of businesses in today's digital landscape.
